sen.j: 松平 資昌（まつだいら すけまさ）は、遠江国浜松藩の第2代藩主。
sen.e: Sukemasa MATSUDAIRA was the second lord of the Hamamatsu domain, Totomi Province.
Sukemasa MATSUDAIRA was the second lord of the Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: Sukemasa MATSUDAIRA was the second lord of the Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province.

sen.j: 後に丹後国宮津藩の初代藩主となる。
sen.e: He became the first lord of the Miyazu domain, Tango Province.
Later, he became the first lord of the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province.
sen.cmt: 「後に」→訳漏れのため訳出、domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: Later, he became the first lord of the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province.
He was the forth generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.
He was the fourth generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.
He was the fourth generation of the Honjo Matsudaira family.

sen.j: 延享元年（1744年）9月29日、三河吉田藩主（後に遠江浜松藩の初代藩主）・松平資訓の三男として三河吉田で生まれる。
sen.e: On November 3, 1744, he was born as the third son of Sukekuni MATSUDAIRA, the lord of the Mikawa-Yoshida domain (later the first lord of the Hamamatsu domain, Totomi Province) in Mikawa-Yoshida domain.

On November 3, 1744, he was born in Yoshida, Mikawa Province as the third son of Sukekuni MATSUDAIRA, the lord of the Mikawa-Yoshida Domain (later the first lord of the Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province).
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更、in Mikawa-Yoshida domain→in Yoshida, Mikawa Provinceとし、位置を移動
sen.e: On November 3, 1744, he was born in Yoshida, Mikawa Province as the third son of Sukekuni MATSUDAIRA, the lord of the Mikawa-Yoshida Domain (later the first lord of the Hamamatsu Domain, Totomi Province).

sen.j: 父の養子となっていた松平資順が世嗣のまま死去したため、延享4年（1747年）2月2日に世子に指名される。
sen.e: His father's adopted child Sukeyuki MATSUDAIRA died early as the heir, so he was appointed to the heir on March 12, 1747.
His father's adopted child Sukeyuki MATSUDAIRA died early as the heir, so he was appointed to the heir on March 12, 1747.
His father's adopted child Sukeyuki MATSUDAIRA died early as the heir, so he was appointed to the heir on March 12, 1747.

sen.j: 宝暦2年（1752年）、父の死去により家督を継いで浜松藩の第2代藩主となる。
sen.e: In 1752, he succeeded to the family head and became the second lord of the Hamamatsu domain due to his father's death.
In 1752, he succeeded to the family head and became the second lord of the Hamamatsu Domain due to his father's death.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: In 1752, he succeeded to the family head and became the second lord of the Hamamatsu Domain due to his father's death.

sen.j: 宝暦8年（1758年）12月27日、丹後宮津藩に移封される。
sen.e: He was transferred to the Miyazu domain, Tango Province on January 25, 1759.
He was transferred to the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province on January 25, 1759.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: He was transferred to the Miyazu Domain, Tango Province on January 25, 1759.

sen.j: しかし病弱で政務を執れなかったため、宝暦11年（1761年）11月27日、家督を養子の松平資尹に譲って隠居する。
sen.e: However, he could not spearhead government affairs due to his delicate health, so he was retired by ceding the family head position to his adopted child Suketada MATSUDAIRA on December 22, 1761.
However, he could not spearhead government affairs due to his delicate health, so he was retired by ceding the family head position to his adopted child Suketada MATSUDAIRA on December 22, 1761.
However, he could not spearhead government affairs due to his delicate health, so he was retired by ceding the family head position to his adopted child Suketada MATSUDAIRA on December 22, 1761.
He died on February 11, 1762.
He died on February 11, 1762.
He died on February 11, 1762.
He was 19 years old.
He was 19 years old.
He was 19 years old.
